title: Grand Promotion EURO BOOM!
text: Every week, we are giving away a trip to the semi-finals of EURO 2024, cash prizes of 10,000,000 sum, Vivo smartphones, and beautiful numbers.And in the final draw – 200 million sum and a trip for two to the final of the UEFA European Football Championship.To participate in the promotion, connect to Beeline, or recharge your balance with 40,000 sum, or purchase a new Vivo smartphone.Starting from March 13, watch the live prize draw every Wednesday with Davron Fayziev on Beeline TV or on Beeline's official social media pages.The promotion is valid from March 4 to April 28.Don't miss your chance!Details

title: March 8th Promotion
text: Dear women, congratulations on International Women's Day, March 8th!May your life be filled with joy, love, and success.To celebrate the occasion, we are launching a promotion – 10 GB of internet traffic for only 10,000 sum!The package is valid for 7 days.The promotion will run from March 7th to March 10th inclusive.You can buy the internet package for yourself or as a gift for a loved one.You can activate the package in the Beeline Uzbekistan app.Download the app in a way that is convenient for you:1. Dial the USSD code *1#;2. Download it from the official app store

title: SmartBook - a library of popular books in brief summaries.
text: We have launched a new service called SmartBook, which allows you to save time on reading popular books.The catalog pressa.beeline.uz/smartbook contains about 800 books in brief summaries, each presented in both audio and text formats simultaneously. The library is updated monthly.All books are categorized as follows:- Self-Development- Business- Finance- Innovations- Society- Family- HealthTo subscribe to the service, you need to:Send 1 to the short number 17110 or log in to the website pressa.beeline.uz/smartbook and enter the confirmation code from the SMS.The cost of the SmartBook service is 1650 soums per day.

Download and install the "Beeline Uzbekistan" application;2. Open the "BeeFortuna Plus" section in the application;3. Spin the drum in "BeeFortuna Plus" and participate in the draw.Drawing dates: January 24, 2024, from 10:00 to 23:59.You can download the "Beeline Uzbekistan" application at the following link: https://m.beeline.uz/wbfffDetailsFollow the winners of the draw: https://beeline.uz/ru/pobediteli-rozygrysha-beefortuna-240124

title: Promotion "Juma takliflari
text: We are pleased to bring you the latest Friday offers, "Juma takliflari"!On January 26, 2024, the following services will be available for you:• 100 GB package for 1 day with auto-renewal for just 5,000 UZS (*110*585#);• 45,000 minutes package for 7 days for just 5,000 UZS (*110*582#);• 30 GB package for 3 days for just 17,000 UZS (*110*584#);• 40 GB package for 7 days for just 30,000 UZS (*110*568#);• 100 GB package for 1 day for just 15,000 UZS (*110*561#);• 150 GB package for 30 days for just 90,000 UZS (*110*562#);• 30 GB package for PUBG Mobile for 30 days for 15,000 UZS (*110*583#);• 100 GB package for YouTube for 30 days for 30,000 UZS (*110*575#);• 150 GB package for Instagram, Facebook, and Odnoklassniki for 30 days for 30,000 UZS (*110*570#).Attention:The packages are available for activation only from 00:00 to 23:59 Tashkent time.You can activate the services on the promotion page and in the "Beeline Uzbekistan" app.Detailed

title: Predict the match outcome and get a chance to win an iPhone 14 Pro Max!
text: Participate in the giveaway easily:▪️ Download/Update the Beeline Uzbekistan app.▪️ On the main page, predict the outcome of the Australia-Uzbekistan match.▪️ Register on Beeline TV.▪️ Watch any content for at least 15 seconds.▪️ Only one answer is accepted from one number.Entries for the giveaway will be accepted until 4:00 PM on January 23, 2024. Don't miss the chance to win an iPhone 14 Pro Max!We will determine the winners among participants who have fulfilled all the conditions through the website www.random.org, broadcast live on the Beeline Uzbekistan page on social media.Stay tuned for updates.

title: Guess the outcome of the match and get a chance to win an iPhone 14 Pro Max!
text: To participate in the draw:▪️ Download/update the Beeline Uzbekistan app.▪️ On the main page, guess the outcome of the Qatar - Uzbekistan match.▪️ Register on Beeline TV.▪️ Watch any content for at least 15 seconds.▪️ Only one answer from the 1st number is accepted.Entries for the draw will be accepted until 20:00 on February 3, 2024.Don't miss the chance to win an iPhone 14 Pro Max!We will determine the winners among participants who have fulfilled all the conditions through the website www.random.org in a live broadcast on the Beeline Uzbekistan page on social networks.Stay tuned for updates.

title: Purchase a smartphone at BMarket and get internet traffic as a gift for 3 months!
text: Upgrade your smartphone and get 15 GB of internet for 30 days during the first three months. Don't miss out on this super offer!Our assortment includes smartphones from various brands and price ranges. We are confident that everyone will find their perfect smartphone here. And with our bonus offer, the purchase becomes even more advantageous!The promotion is limited in time and the number of smartphones, so don't miss your chance!Learn more...

title: Up to 70% off on roaming calls! Now available in 15 tourist-friendly countries!
text: Great news for Beeline customers planning a trip to Turkey, Egypt, Sri Lanka, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, Spain, Cambodia, Greece, Montenegro, Mexico, Indonesia, Cyprus, Seychelles, and Croatia.We have introduced discounts on roaming calls throughout 2024. The cost of outgoing calls to Uzbekistan, local numbers in the destination country, as well as all incoming calls, is now only 7,500 soums per minute.Enjoy your journey and stay connected to the fullest!Learn more

title: The New Year celebration continues with huge discounts on golden numbers!
text: All our offices and dealers are offering special numbers at a 80% discount, ranging in price from 500,000 to 30,000,000 sum!Find the closest Beeline Uzbekistan sales office or dealer, select your individual number combination, and get a golden number at an attractive price!The 80% discount is valid when connecting to the MULTI KUCH, Status, and Oson 1 tariffs.The offer is available until January 31, 2024.

title: Dear Beepul Customers,
text: We would like to inform you about an important update to our application. Starting from January 1, 2024, versions of Beepul below 5.0 will no longer be supported.To continue enjoying all the features of Beepul, we recommend that you update the application to version 5.0 or higher. This will ensure you have the latest functionalities and guarantee stable performance.Thank you for your understanding.Best regards,The Beepul Team.You can update in the PlayMarket and AppStore.

title: For the information of our customers!
text:
We inform you that starting from January 22, 2024, there will be changes in the terms of the tariff plans:Within the daily subscription fee of the "Allo" tariff, 60 minutes and 60 SMS within Uzbekistan will be provided. The subscription fee will be 1,000 soms per day.The cost of outgoing minutes, SMS, and MB after reaching the limits of the tariff plan and services will be as follows:Outgoing within Uzbekistan: UZS 200/minuteSMS within Uzbekistan: UZS 200 /SMSInternet: UZS 150 /MBThese conditions will apply to the "OSON 1" and "OSON 10" tariffs only in case of non-deduction of the subscription fee.More detailsAdditionally, we inform you that starting from January 22, 2024, the cost of outgoing international calls will change on all prepaid tariffs according to the following table:
	
		
			Destination
			Status Silver min/UZS
			Status Gold/ Status Platinum min/UZS
			Other Tariffs min/UZS
